summary: Adds a hall with entrance to all the hold's capitals which stores almost any item.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a storage hall with entrances to all of the hold's capitals. 

The hall has shelves for many different types of items and has places to store the special items you get (with thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4138425]skyrimlazz[/url]).
If it seems like you can't activate the special weapon displays, you have to point slightly in front of the display case. 

The [b][color=#ff7700][size=4]entrance [/size][/color][/b]of the room in [b][size=4]Whiterun[/size][/b] can be found if you enter the city and jump to the right, off the brige. You see a sewer-like entrance (they all look the same). The one in [size=4][b]Solitude[/b][/size] is ro your right when you enter the city. You can hardly miss it. The entrance in [size=4][b]Winterhold [/b][/size]is to the righthand side of the bridge to the college. The other are harder to describe, or I've simply forgotten where they are myself... I will add pictures of them once I have the time for it.

The special items you can store are:
Sanguine's Rose
Wabbajack
Skull of Corruption
Ebony Blade
Rueful axe
Mace of Molag Bal
Maehrunes Razor
Volendrung
Dawnbreaker
Spellbreaker
The dragonpriest-masks
Calavius Vile's mask
Miraak's mask
Other masks from Dragonborn
Namira's ring
Hincine's ring
All claws
All paragons
All jars with bugs
The three Elder Scrolls
All of the Black Books
Oghma Infinium

The amount of other items to be stored are: (don't worry, it also has two chests to store the rest)
8 sets or armorr (there are 8 mannequins)
36 loose pieces of armor (I recomment only helmets, boots and gauntlets. You can also put clothes here)
3 shields + 1 shield with 2 weapons
18 ingredients
12 soulgems
17 weapons on racks and 7 weapons on plaques
72 miscitems (brooms don't work that well ;P)
108 scrolls (2 X 18 on one shelf)
216 books

Above the hold's doors are shieldracks as well, on which you can hang the hold's shields.

Next to the storage capacity, this hall also has some crafting stations. 
Anvil
Workbench
Sharpening Wheel
Enchanter
Alchemylab

TO DO LIST:
-make the storage room for the armor and misc. items bigger, in the hope that the items won't float
-Make screenshots of the entrances to the room
-Look into General Stores
-Add a modders resource for the shelves on Nexus.
author: ErianDragonborn
